articles.author: Andrew Amsan
articles.title: Tajinderpal Singh Toor sets new Asian shot put record days after losing grandmother - The Indian Express
articles.description: Punjab athlete hurls 21.77m to break his own mark set two years ago and gets emotional after the feat
articles.content: The moment the shot put left Tajinderpal Singh Toors hands in his third attempt at the interstate meet on Monday, the reigning Asian Games champion knew it was going to be a huge throw. The gentle gi… [+4118 chars]
